item.title: Public right of way blocked, 4th August
item.description:
Just past the junction of Brookfield road and badgeworth road there is a public footpath which has been blocked with barbed wire wrapped around the gate and fence, the sign has been cut off and access from the other end of the path has been blocked too. This is an important path going between very dangerous national speed limit roads with no accommodation for pedestrians, especially on cold pool lane. Iâ€™d really appreciate knowing when this is resolved so I can safely use this route

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth Road, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose and noisy manhole cover on Station road, outside 1 Barnhay perimeter wall. Junction of Station Road/Pirton Lane (Churchdown), 3rd August
item.description:
Junction of Station Road/Pirton Lane (Churchdown). Although this has been reported before (over 1 year ago) and an attempted repair to the tarmac was made, it didn't cure the issue. Since the gas pipe upgrade, the noise from this item has increased to disturbing levels. The problem is the manhole cover itself is not sitting correctly in its frame. It is a diagonal split cover design, which can heard even when standing on it! When cars go over it, the noise is incredibly loud.The whole unit needs replacing! This is disturbing our family and visitors' sleep and enjoyment of the garden. The noise level and frequency of it is increasing daily and is affecting my personal mental health.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
